input.sentences: this small town is absolutely gorgeous .
inside the city holds little markets run by commoners .
a large portion of the population get around on bikes since the town is so small .
the insides of the buildings are a sight to see as well . it is truly a beautiful town .
output.sentences: This historical town is absolutely gorgeous.
We took a run and stopped inside every on of the markets we found.
We even discovered a portion of the town where the majority of the population only rides bikes to get around.
This is just one building with sunning architecture in a town full of them.
The sight of everything in this town gave my insides a warm fuzzy feeling.
